TextView.android:text: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and spa and wellness centre, Radisson Blu Hotel Ranchi offers 4 dining options. It is located 3 km from the pristine Ranchi Lake. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. The Ranchi Junction Railway Station is located 1 km from Radisson Blu Hotel. The major Hatia Railway Station and Birsa Munda Airport are within 5 km. The Doranda Jain Temple and the beautiful Tagore Hill are also 5 km. The Jagannathpur Temple and Pahari Temple are within 15 km. Air-conditioned rooms come with a minibar, electric kettle and flat-screen satellite TV. A desk, sofa and safety deposit boxes are also provided. The attached bathroom includes shower and free toiletries. The staffs at 24-hour front desk are happy to help the guests with packed lunches, laundry and currency exchange. A business centre and meeting space are available. Guests can make use of the tour desk to make travel arrangements. A car can be rented for sightseeing.

This hotel is situated in Ranchi – the City of Waterfalls, a 5-minute walk from Ranchi Market and 250 m from Firayalal Chowk. It houses 3 dining options, a salon and a fitness centre. Hotel Le Lac (Ranchi) is 4 km from Ranchi Railway Station and 7 km from Ranchi Airport. It is 30 km from Dasam, Hundra and Johna Waterfalls. Air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a wardrobe and a seating area. The en suite bathroom comes with hot and cold water supply. Guests can dine at Flavours – a fine dining restaurant serving Indian and international delights. Alternatively, they can have a cocktail or mocktail at Chill bar.

Featuring a massage parlour and offering one way free airport shuttle, Hotel The Pinnacle is 100 m from Jaipal Singh Stadium and 2.5 km from Local Bus Station. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Hotel The Pinnacle is 4 km from Rock Garden and Ranchi Railway Station. The Birsa Munda Airport is 8 km away from the property. The air-conditioned room comes with a heater, seating area and flat-screen cable TV. The private bathroom includes hairdryer and shower. The property operates a 24-hour front desk to help guests with breakfast buffet, newspaper and currency exchange. A business centre and meeting space is available. To organise day trips or hire a car guests can approach tour desk.
